__TOC__


The Ubuntu HoustonTeam meetings are scheduled monthly, near the middle of the month. We're on the lookout for good meeting venues. If you have any suggestions please send them to the mailing list and/or add them to the /PotentialVenues page.  And check the list of Facebook for current information.  We are very bad about updateing this page. :)
